name: KIT-10 Distract-O-Matic
tagline: Keep your kitty entertained for hours!
body:
Laser Turret Cat Toy
========================
Arduino-based laser turret/automatic cat toy using a [pan-tilt rig](http://r.ebay.com/1T5tfm) and [Pro Trinket](https://www.adafruit.com/products/2000) from Adafruit. Random laser path, speed and pauses determined by homebrew Markov chain algorithm.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/stuthedew/Arduino-Laser-Cat-Turret/gh-pages/images/Project_photos/IMG_1844.JPG)

***

## Parts list
### Electronics
* 1 x 5V [Pro Trinket](https://www.adafruit.com/products/2000)
* 1 x [Laser Diode](https://www.adafruit.com/products/1054)
* 1 x [Linear Potentiometer w/ detents](http://www.jameco.com/webapp/wcs/stores/servlet/Product_10001_10001_163563) (I could have used a rotary switch like this [one](https://www.sparkfun.com/products/13253) from Sparkfun, but I liked the smooth feel of the potentiometer)
